nodes.bodyText: oops, will change these repo after others review
commented code likely to be uncommented?

add TODO for highlighting
https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/using-todo.html
alternatively can setToolLicenseInformation skip tools without a github token to avoid it being dead code?
You already have an empty LicenseInformation from line 99.
You could also use the same empty LicenseInformation here.
Any reason not to log this? Unless it's common, it's a new feature and might be helpful in figuring out what is going wrong.
Hadn't noticed this before, but it would be nice if the keys were at least constants. But this is already like this in several places, so don't bother
You're not getting a quay token

Interesting, hadn't noticed/clicked until now that you're doing this for the entry, not the version. This means it's getting the license for the repo. Is it going off the default branch? Probably fine for now, but I wonder if we eventually need to track at the version level. It's rare that licenses change, although I've seen it, and I don't know if they're retroactive or not -- I guess it depends on how the license content.
GitHub doesn't track it at version level. There was quite a bit of discussion when this was a draft PR. Check out my PR message (before all the edits)
